trans-unit.source: Provides data for input related events.
trans-unit.target: 为输入相关的事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: InputEventArgs is the base class for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] input event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: InputEventArgs 是为基类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]输入事件自变量类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs"></xref> class.
The input device to associate with this event.
trans-unit.target: 输入要与此事件关联的设备。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
Gets the input device that initiated this event.
trans-unit.target: 获取启动此事件的输入的设备。

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 与此事件关联的输入的设备。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 将事件处理程序调用的特定类型的方式，这可以提高事件系统效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将强制转换的泛型处理程序，可为<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler>并调用它。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关此实现模式和它的原因的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 要以特定类型的方式调用的泛型处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 要在调用处理程序的目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取此事件发生时的时间。
